response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and innovation. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I'm offering this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $125. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly special at a fantastic deal. I trust you'll appreciate its worth and make the most out of this offer.", "product_price": 125}
